```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("udemy_dataset.csv") 
head(data)
```

```{r}
data$high_rating <- data$course_rating >= 4
ggplot(data, aes(x=price,fill=factor(high_rating)))+geom_density(alpha=0.5)+
 xlab(label = "Fixed Acidity Level")+
 ggtitle("Distribution of Fixed Acidity Levels")+
 theme_minimal()
```
